item.title: CVE-2024-31290|2024-05-17T08:54:36.992Z -- CodeRevolution -- Demo My WordPress
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in CodeRevolution Demo My WordPress allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Demo My WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.9.1.
